website_summaries.verdict: For those with specific uses for a HUE smart bulb, such as TV backlighting, this is a great choice. It is easily recognizable by most systems. Price point may be too high for a regular LED bulb replacement, however.
pros: Works well with an existing Philips hub and app
Light temperatures run the entire cool-to-warm spectrum
Can be set to change back lighting during TV viewing
cons: On the expensive side, not for whole house bulb replacement
First generation, does not reproduce greens well
Must be kept "on" for maximum performance

customer_reviews.title: Philips Hue:  "Lighting The Way To Bankruptcy"
customer_reviews.text: I'm going broke buying these! I've got 21 canned lights in my house and now all of them have this bulb. Very highly recommended. Awesome capabilities from lighting intensity to an infinite color variation ability. The only down side to these is that if you think you're just going to do one fixture in the house, don't do it. When you do, it will be so awesome, you'll find yourself going to Home Depot to buy more. They'll be out so you'll have to do it online. And after that..... your house will be awesome but your bank account will be..... "un-awesome". Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy.
customer_reviews.text: If you have a Philips hub up and running this light is a plug-and-play affair. Screw into a floor lamp or (in my case) recessed ceiling fixture, turn on the light, and find the light in your Philips app. It's a bigger version of the standard dimmable color changing bulbs and seems to adjust brightness and colors a little faster. It works with all the apps the standard Philips bulbs work with like the SyFy app to color match to scenes in their (very limited) movie selection. One star off because it still costs too much for a solitary lightbulb.
customer_reviews.author: Bearforce

customer_reviews.title: Hue Bulbs Work Reliably/Save Money Over Time
customer_reviews.text: Hue lights are expensive, but worth it for me. They don't use very much electricity as it is, and I automate them around the house, so they don't get left on. In my experience, they seem to last forever. I've had my oldest ones for a few years. I have other colored bulbs, but these are the most reliable and have the greatest range of colors. Plus, I can control them from a variety of apps. IFTTT even lets me trigger them with motion sensors, so in the middle of the night I can have dim lights on the way to and from the bathroom. Yay for no stubbed toes.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: It's good, not great.
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with my Philips Hue lighting system, however this particular bulb is my least favorite. While it does what is advertised, this bulb doesn't have the full rich blue & green colors that the regular series 2/3 A9 bulbs. I had initially bought it to light up our wetbar area but ended up replacing that with a series 3 A9 bulb. I now use this one as an accent light in the kitchen and it does the trick but I do with it had the richer colors. Unless you very specifically need a "flood" type bulb you may want to consider the other bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Moore

customer_reviews.title: Zeus or Thor, thunder and lightning.
customer_reviews.text: Having fun with these. Installed them in several places in the house. Now it's Alexa turn on or off the kitchen, or wherever. Got some apps for my smartphone that allow me to orchestrate light and sound. My girlfriend and cats think I can call up thunderstorms on demand. Zeus from Mt Olympus.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Great for turning your house into a smart home!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! We are starting to integrate the HUE system in our new house to make it more of a smart home and we couldn't be more happy with this. We purchased these to replace our can lights (which are a huge waste of electricity) and we're so happy we did. It's amazing what changing the lighting color in your house can do. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy. This is a Gen 1 and cannot produce GREEN.
customer_reviews.text: This is a gen 1 bulb. Apparently the gen 1 bulb cannot generate GREEN or variations of. So, no teal either. The gen 2 model number is 456665.
customer_reviews.author: bernesto

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: These are Insanely easy to use (just screw them in and download the app). They last a LONG time, use very little power, and create some great effects! Definately recommend getting the switches as the app can be tough to get used to pulling out everytime you want to turn on/off the lights, but I like it. My house is now full of these lights. Great for holidays, parties, security (set to timers), waking up (5600K - sunlight) settings, and just every day convenience.
customer_reviews.author: K. DeYoung

customer_reviews.title: Awesome functionality, 1 out of 6 failed, very unhappy with that
customer_reviews.text: I bought 6 of these. I love programming these with home automation. The ability to signal a state or problem with color is fantastic. Out of the 6 I bought, one went unresponsive within ~8 months. The bad one suddenly just stayed powered on but did not respond to any commands. The hub declared it missing. I rebooted, moved it, moved the hub, tried dozens of ways to fix it. Its just done. So now I have five. These are WAY too expensive to have one fail after 8 months. Now I'm trying the much cheaper GE Zigbee lights. They are supposed to work with a hue hub. crossing fingers!
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lights
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights. I've replaced my entire first floor (kitchen, dining area, living rooms) with these lights, and they work great. Combined with Alexa, as well as other apps, there is nothing these lights can't do! I bought the color lights to set moods throughout the house. They are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Hap

customer_reviews.title: Dependable corner lighting
customer_reviews.text: These are a great addition to your wireless lighting set up. I purchased some small light fixtures that allow me to angle the lights forward out into the room, or back toward the wall. I put them in each corner of my living room. They are perfect for adding up light to illuminate the ceiling. You will want at least two of these per room to get the right effect. No problem connecting these as usual the Phillips Hue brand is the best and most dependable out there right now!
customer_reviews.author: MikeA

customer_reviews.title: Poor color gradients
customer_reviews.text: The color grades on this g1 model suck! Lime green, purple, pink and orange are all you can get. I have 3 of these and they are nit nearly as good as the newer bulbs. Spend $5 and be happier with your lights...
customer_reviews.author: K. Gust

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality, Great Brightness
customer_reviews.text: I have these set up in the sconces in my living room. They are excellent and provide lots of light. As with the reviews of my other Hue products, this one is also flawless. If you're interested in controlling these without a phone (especially since they give access to everyone in the household) I recommend thefor the living room or family room andfor bedrooms. They really tie everything together quite nicely.
customer_reviews.author: jpcguy89

customer_reviews.title: Philips stopped supporting, lights now useless.
customer_reviews.text: Philips stopped supporting bridge, so my switches, voice control and app no longer communicate with lights.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: The perfect light with the kit in one bed room
customer_reviews.text: Works for my fourth light in my room and it gives the room balance. My only critique its not that bright if you use cool colors. Too bad theres no Aqua green colors for the Hue Palette, it either blue or close to violet or indigo. Now my room looks like an arcade or bar with these lights its very awesome and its not boring anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would be fun to have for party tricks, like IFTTT recipes and color loops, but I actually get a lot of practical use out of them too. We've found the best light setting, which feels much more comfortable than just using whatever the basic bulb throws out. I definitely like and recommend these lights. Setup and use are super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Put it in an area where there's plenty of wall to be hit as well, and you can create a great mood!
customer_reviews.text: I have this bulb in my recessed can in the middle of my hallway -- and while it's only one light, it casts wonderful color throughout the entire hall. This is the only downlight of the hue-brand that I own, but after this positive experience I will likely be looking to purchase more. Expensive? Heck yes. Worth it? Depends on what you value in a light... ...but LED's supposedly last ~12 years or so -- so I happen to think it's worth it. :)
customer_reviews.author: The Active Geek

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend.  High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love my Hue lights. I have 12 of them now and plan to get more. They are expensive but they really set the mood of the house. I put these BR30 in the ceiling of my porch. I had to file down the inside lip of the trim to get the bulb to fit but you can't see anything and it turned out fantastic. I like the fact that I can just tell Alexa to turn off the porch. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: MCTronix

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: easy to set up, Green color looks awful (more yellow than green) bulbs have a high pitched hum that is anoying in a quite room.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Smith

customer_reviews.title: The fact that the Hue hub app doesn't have the ...
customer_reviews.text: The fact that the Hue hub app doesn't have the features to let you specify a color path through which to shift this lamp, nor control the on/off by sunset/sunrise is an issue but a problem with the Hue app/hub, not the bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas S.

customer_reviews.title: I got the blues blues
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 at the same time and one of them can't turn as blue as the others. One bulb is slightly purple as if the red LEDs can't turn all the way off. I originally thought it was how I set it up, but I'm using hex color values #0000FF and not an image.
customer_reviews.author: RYAN K POWERS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Lighting system.Got the starter kit and bought two of these.Want to get four more for the bed room..Got my house complete with this system and my Vera Lite zwave is all connected together..This is great stuff and well worth the money..The taps are a plus in case you dont want to use your smart phone all the time..I will get more for each room..It is costly but you only live once...
customer_reviews.author: Len Ricupero

customer_reviews.title: Won't turn blue or green
customer_reviews.text: These lights are garbage !!!!!! I returned a set because of the same problem . they are high ceiling lights so it took time to install only to find out they too don't turn blue or green . I must go back and take them down to get a refund ! Im pissed don't buy these lights
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Tranquil settings, a great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have 17 of these throughout the house, mainly on the lower level. I love these and all the recipies that can be created. I like OnSwitch app to program these in addition to the Philips Hue app. These lights really do make you feel more relaxed and are truly enjoyable when they are on. Right now I have the Christmas theme going so all of them turn different colors every 10-15 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great custom use option.
customer_reviews.text: Love these in my living room. Replaces 4 can light bulbs with these. All on the same switch, but now I can control each bulb separately if I want. I have added the Philips Dimmer Switch to the room as well to give others in the house the ability to dim without the need for a phone.
customer_reviews.author: lostraider

customer_reviews.title: You need these.
customer_reviews.text: I installed 4 in my can lights for the kitchen. I downloaded the Hue Disco for Alexa. The kids and grand-kids danced late in the evening. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: David Butler

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Highly recommend if looking for colored light solution.
customer_reviews.text: Started with 1 for "fun" in the office. Now have 12 bulbs and a light strip. Great for theater rooms, parties and just setting a better mood in the evening. Not cheap but have better color/quality then other brands. Software from Phillips continues to update/allow more options for setting.
customer_reviews.author: John Lattanzio

customer_reviews.title: The right life for any occasion or if you just want to create an in home disco :-)
customer_reviews.text: Always loved Hue lights since day one...now the entire house is on Hue. A great way to set the mood for anything...
customer_reviews.author: PerkiJr

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise Hue makes a great product that's super fun
customer_reviews.text: One of my the bulbs I ordered made a humming noise, but not the other three (and I shifted them around to see if it was the socket, and it didn't seem to be the case. Otherwise Hue makes a great product that's super fun. Being new, maybe a few of these didn't quite pass inspection. I would have returned it, but it worked in another socket fine. Odd.
customer_reviews.author: John Boyden

customer_reviews.title: These bulbs are good replacements for standard bulbs
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are good replacements for standard bulbs. The only reason I gave it a 3 instead of a 4 or 5 was because its not as bright. 650 lumens.
customer_reviews.author: dred

customer_reviews.title: First time buying anything like this and now I want to buy more lights ...
customer_reviews.text: First time buying anything like this and now I want to buy more lights from the Hue product line. They are not cheap unfortunately. But, I am buying with confidence in the brand.
customer_reviews.author: RatedM3

customer_reviews.title: Cannot connect used bulbs
customer_reviews.text: I have quite a few hue bulbs, but this was my first time ordering them open box/used. After extensive trying with multiple hubs, I cannot get find these bulbs. As said before I have tried on different networks with different hubs as well as used the manual and automatic pairing functions. The only thing that changed from my previous Hue orders is that these bulbs are "used" and have been synced with another hub before.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Weber

customer_reviews.title: would not sync directly to my hue bridge 2. ...
customer_reviews.text: would not sync directly to my hue bridge 2.0. i had to actually go out and buy another single A19 hue bulb so that these lights can sync with that bulb which in turn syncs with the bridge. Do not buy this as a stand alone, only an addition to existing bulbs!
customer_reviews.author: Matt B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, but Pricey Lights
customer_reviews.text: These are so much fun to mess with. I have many tasks running these lights to strobe, disco, holidays, etc. Only con is the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: 1rst Gen :(
customer_reviews.text: Didn't read reviews or wouldn't have purchased this first gen bulb. The first gens don't make teals or blues correctly (appear lavender) and some of the recipes in the app display as whitish.
customer_reviews.author: Anonom Emous

customer_reviews.title: worth the money 14 year life on bulbs
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect size lights for my recessed lighting in my kitchen. Was not sure if the lights would fit but they fit perfectly.they are a nice bright white light but they do change color also. Easy to pair to the app. Great for amazon echo.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Love these bulbs
customer_reviews.text: These are the future in home lighting. Not only can I turn off and on from my phone but make costume light shades from my own personal photos. Cant wait to replace every bulb in my home with these.
customer_reviews.author: Geopeach209

customer_reviews.title: in good condition. The bridge didn't find this particular bulb ...
customer_reviews.text: This order came in just over 24 hours, in good condition. The bridge didn't find this particular bulb until I manually entered the serial number, so the lesson is to copy the number before you put the bulb in the ceiling. After that, it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: It works very well. I answer alarms and themes. Sometimes the hub looses connection and you have to reset but I blame that on the internet provider
customer_reviews.author: Eric Gunn

customer_reviews.title: ... these bulbs around the house and they really are great. Easy to set up with the Hue app
customer_reviews.text: I have tons of these bulbs around the house and they really are great. Easy to set up with the Hue app, and easy to add to an existing network of lights.
customer_reviews.author: Greell

customer_reviews.title: Works as described.
customer_reviews.text: It has worked for quite some time now. Pairing more devices can sometimes be a pain, but a recent update seems to have made a things a lot more user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: asmz_me

customer_reviews.title: Philips hues were a great gift for my tech savvy husband
customer_reviews.text: Philips hues were a great gift for my tech savvy husband. One of our bulbs does lag behind the other which is very bothersome, so I wonder if it is a defect with just that bulb. Other than that they are great and fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeCustomerK

customer_reviews.title: Hi-Tech Lights
customer_reviews.text: I have 8 of these and like having them. The range from the bridge has been a challenge and one of the bulbs flaked out and I had to go to Phillips to deal with it. They took care of it, but it took a long time. Now I need to find the time to program them to do many of the cool things they can do.
customer_reviews.author: Walter J. Spurgiasz III

customer_reviews.title: Colors!
customer_reviews.text: Hue lights rock - ever since I got the starter kit I've been adding to our hours. Pretty sure my wife thinks I have a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product with best offer from Amazon.com Thanks to Amazon who offer buy one set get one free Hue bulb. It is a great saving for this amazing products. I can remote control the light anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: L. Alain

customer_reviews.title: Best. Bulbs. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: I won't stop until I replace all the lights in my house with these. I have purchased other brands but none compare to these. Just buy these, stop shopping around.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Great red/blue output but with very limited green
customer_reviews.text: Great red/blue output but with very limited green. Suitable replacement of conventional bulbs for room lighting. I use these with a few Lux bulbs (for cost) for day-to-day illumination and for colored mood lighting (especially dim orange/reds in the evening).
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Szabo

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: Very very good light. Works well with the android app. Not as bright as the 60W bulbs they replaced but bright enough for our purpose.
customer_reviews.author: M. Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Great with Google Home
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for highlighting a room with different effects. Quick and easy to install, integrated perfectly with Google Home!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great if you need flood lights to put in your ceiling.
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs where very easy to add to my current hue set up you just go to the hue app on your smart phone and tell it to search for new lights and it will automaticlly add them to your set up. These are great flood lights to use in your ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Nice ambiance
customer_reviews.text: I love the Hue bulbs, but they are so expensive
customer_reviews.author: Opinionatedenough

customer_reviews.title: Been a hue user for a while. This is ...
customer_reviews.text: Been a hue user for a while. This is the first 'spotlight' bulb I got, to use in the kitchen. I was impressed at how bright it is. The normal (colored) hue bulbs are a bit dim but this works well for the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: John Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought Four of these for our living room. Work very well. Saves energy, heat, and they are way cool. Will be purchasing more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Eric m

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing and well worth the price. Love using them with the different apps on iOS. I replaced all my can lights in the basement with these. We like to run the thunderstorm theme, turn on the skylight effect, or have them change in rhythm to my music.
customer_reviews.author: Dont_Be_Deuby

customer_reviews.title: but we now both love these. We have several Philips Hue products and ...
customer_reviews.text: It took some convincing my wife to get these, but we now both love these. We have several Philips Hue products and they all integrate really well with each other, and many of our portable devices.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Derathe

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for fixtures that aren't tiny, or  desk lamps
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs have changed how I light my home, allowed me to adjust my lighting from the curb, as well as enjoy complex and fluid variations of beautiful colors in the background of my everyday life. They've also saved me a significant amount on my power bill compared to their incandescent predecessors..
customer_reviews.author: S01001000

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bulb have four in my bedroom controlled by google ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bulb have four in my bedroom controlled by google assistant and hooked up with my razer synapse to sync with my gaming setup.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: These are both great and frustrating
customer_reviews.text: These are both great and frustrating... Pro's: - color spectrum is fantastic, you really can customize them to your look and feel. - IFTTT makes these really have a purpose Con's: -I've purchased 14 I've had to send 13 in to be replaced. not good. -When will the next one break? -When will I have to call support to get another one Overall, sometimes I feel this was not worth the premium purchase cost...
customer_reviews.author: BR

customer_reviews.title: Look somewhere other than Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: These are the old model, and are priced the same as the new model. Best buy has a better deal.
customer_reviews.author: Court Watson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome smart light bulbs. Very easy to configure and use.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Whicker

customer_reviews.title: The hue collection grows
customer_reviews.text: Great internet ready color changing bulb from Philips. Added to the 4 I previously owned. The one missing star is for the high price of course. One day the price will come down enough and I will replace every bulb possible with these!
customer_reviews.author: Bronnie

customer_reviews.title: but it feels like you're hacking the app to do something it wasn't ...
customer_reviews.text: The app still needs refined. The odd aspect of Hue to me is that Philips wants you do do "scenes" where each bulb assumes a different color. So for example a Christmas scene might be a mix of red, green, and gold lights. I want a group of lights to all change to the same color. So in my setting, I want a theater room to be able to dim down to a certain color. You can make the app do that, but it feels like you're hacking the app to do something it wasn't really designed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Farris

customer_reviews.title: Good bulb
customer_reviews.text: Great for overhead recessed lights. Just measure to make sure it'll fit. Reproduces colors pretty well, except for green.
customer_reviews.author: rfphill

customer_reviews.title: Great but expensive
customer_reviews.text: Great but a bit too expensive for what it is and doesn't produce green very well
customer_reviews.author: Zack D.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted and shipped to me in perfect condition. Now I can choose from millions of ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted and shipped to me in perfect condition. Now I can choose from millions of colors and scenes
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: pricey but very capable bulb, led DOES reduce consumption, and the remote control is a very usable extra
customer_reviews.text: Great bulb, fortunately the price has dropped from 58 to 49 dollars making it easier to replace more bulbs. having gone solar recently I am very much looking into item usage and replacing a 100W bulb with a led <10W one seems only smart making my solar last longer. Of course it is an investment, but then if you dont need the colors, which is nice for the gimick aspect of it, go for the 29 dollar shades of white one. comparing to a regular led bulb of half the price you have a remotely controled device that saves money
customer_reviews.author: xander

customer_reviews.title: Suffers from same terrible color quality as old Gen II A19 bulbs. Don't buy these yet but wait for a new version.
customer_reviews.text: I've had intermittent connection problems with these, but that is a minor issue. The main reason I'm not giving these a high rating is that they have exactly the same problem as the Gen I and Gen II A19 bulbs: the colors are horrible. These can't produce a real green, and all the colors these do produce are very unsaturated. Philips fixed the A19 bulbs and their Gen III bulbs are great. I'm guessing they will fix these next, so you may be frustrated if you buy these and then they come out with a better version a few months later.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Birge

customer_reviews.title: standard "colors" are good and the 16million others you can choose are a ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well, standard "colors" are good and the 16million others you can choose are a nice bonus. Expensive, but I have always felt Phillips to be the best brand for this sort of thing.
customer_reviews.author: C. Tate

customer_reviews.title: forget it 😀 lasts long and looks beautiful. Loved the investment
customer_reviews.text: Buy it, fix it, forget it 😀 lasts long and looks beautiful. Loved the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Jasraj S.

customer_reviews.title: Man these things are fun! The BR30 are noticeably brighter than the other ...
customer_reviews.text: Man these things are fun! The BR30 are noticeably brighter than the other model made for lamps. I was actually surprised at how much brighter!
customer_reviews.author: G. Widener

customer_reviews.title: But home kit integration is very poor. I was not successful to use my iPhone ...
customer_reviews.text: Works when it works. But home kit integration is very poor. I was not successful to use my iPhone continuously for more than 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Shine

customer_reviews.title: Works great -- I've been using it outdoors under the soffit ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great -- I've been using it outdoors under the soffit fo months, heavy rains, still works fine. Say not for outdoors, but I'll take the chance.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin, The Kevin

customer_reviews.title: I'm much happier with the standard lights and am looking to purchase ...
customer_reviews.text: This light does everything the standard Hue light does except put out much light. I'm much happier with the standard lights and am looking to purchase more as my budget allows.
customer_reviews.author: B. BADE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent flood lamp. Very bright and has been dependable during use with my HUE system.
customer_reviews.author: MartinG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cant say enough good things about these lights. The app is great and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Best

customer_reviews.title: Seriously throw away all your lightbulbs and try these
customer_reviews.text: So, these are definitely the coolest light bulbs of all time. My favorite thing about them: THE COLORS! My lights automatically set to dim as the sun sets and mirrors the sunset colors. This lightbulb can produce many different colors, and aren't just limited to 'blue' 'red' 'yellow' etc. I bought them to be used in conjunction with the Phillips Hue Personal Wireless Lighting system and have several of these throughout my condo. You can have up to 50 of them per wireless unit. However, I bought less than 10 and it seems to fit my needs. The range of these lightbulbs is quite high too—I haven't run into any issues of reaching the wireless hub.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband is happy with his lights. It allows him to have a great atmosphere. Easy to connect.
customer_reviews.author: Tea

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: a little expensive for a light, but it works well enough
customer_reviews.author: BW12345

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have them in my living room recessed ports, and they are awesome
customer_reviews.author: Derrall Moore

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 14 Hue lights and they are amazing. i would recommend everyone use hue. Get a Hue tap switch. Makes you transition easier to using the different outputs.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: only a toy if you use normal physical light switches
customer_reviews.text: This is an amusing toy, but it is useless as primary lighting if you use normal physical wall switches. Every time you turn the light off and back on, it will default to bright "warm" white lighting. If you don't plan to turn on/off lights only with your app or smart switches, then this is nonsense. Philips has stated this will never be fixed since they like that behavior so they don't get in trouble if someone's lights don't come on bright enough in an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Prolific Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lighting. The app for the lighting continues to ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice lighting. The app for the lighting continues to get better. Very durable. I dropped one from a six foot ladder onto concrete and it bounced. Worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Robb

customer_reviews.title: Good, *but*
customer_reviews.text: These really do produce good, interesting colors, but the IOS GUI is pretty sucky and I really wish there was a mode which would slowly change the colors indefinitely.
customer_reviews.author: N. Lai

customer_reviews.title: Who knew?
customer_reviews.text: I never imagined that I would love these lightbulbs as much as I do. I spend too much time designing lighting scenes and mood. Fantastic fun. Who knew?
customer_reviews.author: Jon STOA

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic light
customer_reviews.text: This light is fantastic as all the Philips Hue lights are. We started out buying a few just to play with the colors, but ended up outfitting the entire house because there is so much you can do with these lights.
customer_reviews.author: W. F. Van Steenburg

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use link with the Hues system and with ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use link with the Hues system and with Alexa. These bulbs also change color and almost any color scheme can be used. A great product for use in a smart home system.
customer_reviews.author: Ira P.

customer_reviews.title: Great color spot.  "Alexa, turn off Hallway light."  Need I say more?
customer_reviews.text: Automation replacement for your recessed spots. Color is fun but combined with amazon Echo it is convenient as hell!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: though overpriced it is the best smart color bulb out there.
customer_reviews.author: Ajain

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My wife keeps making me buy more. Loves the mood lighting... bedroom, bathroom... kitchen is next.
customer_reviews.author: jarom r lee

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping and great product. You can add as many as you ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and great product. You can add as many as you like to your current hue or zwave setup so they're convenient and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle G.

customer_reviews.title: Loud buzzing
customer_reviews.text: It's a fun toy, however not practical. We purchased 10 bulbs 4 weeks ago and 6 of the bulbs we have had to replace because they buzz. We have returned them all and went back to the old bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Serious lack of colors. Go for the 2nd gen BR30 instead.
customer_reviews.text: These things are cool, but keep in mind this is the first gen BR30 bulb. Look elsewhere and find the second gen. This literally does not do blues. Set it to any shade of blue and the bulb will glow purple. The deepest shade of green is a washed out yellow with a greenish hue. Pretty disappointing for a $50 bulb advertised as being able to display millions of different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Sweet!
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable that this runs on just 7 W. Absolutely beautiful bulbs added to our Hue ecosystem!
customer_reviews.author: MJT

customer_reviews.title: Phillips Hue, the coolest thing since sliced bread!
customer_reviews.text: The coolest thing since sliced bread. I bought these to change moods and accentuate the room we put them in. Set up was pretty easy, naming and syncing the light were just a tad rough but I managed it. You do have to download the app. I would highly recommend the "On Switch" app to accompany the Phillips Hue app. I was able to set up the bridge for two Ipads and Iphones. The only issue is that the range of green is very limited, I was inable to reach a very dark green. When you shut the lights off they default back to white. These are the bulbs only, you need the bridge to control the lights.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. G

customer_reviews.title: Hue is for you
customer_reviews.text: Hue is rad. Period. Our whole house is hue. If you don't like hue then we can't be friends.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: beautiful addition to our home
customer_reviews.text: beautiful addition to our home. color range and choices are astounding, set up was a breeze. halloween effects with apps and plugins were fun and interesting.
customer_reviews.author: Byron A. Gronseth

customer_reviews.title: but otherwise this has been a great additiion to my home
customer_reviews.text: I wish hue was accessible via the cloud rather that only inside my home network, but otherwise this has been a great additiion to my home.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Very good way to get all of your home automatic
customer_reviews.text: Very good way to get all of your home automatic! i prefer to use hue lamps with always on eletricity, and you turn on or off when you want... i dont like to use with wall switches...
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio Nicacio de Souza

customer_reviews.title: Party time
customer_reviews.text: More fun then ever at our parties. However, on the pricey side.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Coble

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really cool. Not real bright but if you have enough they are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

product_meta.title: Philips Hue White and Color Ambiance 1st Generation BR30 60W Equivalent Dimmable LED Smart Flood Light (Older Model Compatible with Amazon Alexa Apple HomeKit and Google Assistant)
product_meta.description: Limitless possibilities for an extraordinary experience. Include a Philips Hue white and color ambiance flood light in your Philips Hue system and experience high quality white and colored light that offers you endless possibilities.
feature_bullets: Works with Alexa for voice control (hub required, Alexa device and hub sold separately)
Choose between millions of colors and shades of white light to light your home, wireless controlling with your smartphone or tablet and syncing your light immersively to music, games, and movies
Requiring the Hue Hub (sold separately) for the full Hue experience, this BR30 LED smart flood light is designed to fit recessed cans and downlights
Install the LED light as you would install ordinary bulbs, pairing them with the Hue Hub, which allows you to control smart-bulb-equipped lights via the Philips Hue App
Easily expand your lighting system with accessories (sold separately), such as a Hue Dimmer Switch, Hue Tap, or Hue Motion Sensor. Pair it for automation with your existing Nest or SmartThings system

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars244 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
